original_text: And Abraham took the wood of the burnt offering and laid it on Isaac his son. And he took in his hand the fire and the knife. So they went both of them together.
korean_text: 아브라함이 이에 번제 나무를 가져다가 그의 아들 이삭에게 지우고 자기는 불과 칼을 손에 들고 두 사람이 동행하더니

sentences.original_text: And Abraham took the wood of the burnt offering
and laid it on Isaac his son.
And he took in his hand the fire and the knife.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 손에 불과 칼을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: So they went both of them together.
